channel.title: CVE Feed for CData -- API Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CData -- API Server

item.title: CVE-2024-31848|2024-04-05T17:39:46.001Z -- CData -- API Server
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in the Java version of CData API Server < 23.4.8844 when running using the embedded Jetty server, which could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain complete administrative access to the application.
